title: NATS Messaging Dashboard
description: Complete production monitoring for NATS messaging: connections, messages, JetStream, clustering, and resources.

panels.title: Connection Utilization %
panels.description: Percentage of max connections in use.

panels.title: Slow Consumers
panels.description: Active slow consumers. Non-zero = clients can't keep up.

panels.title: Pending Bytes
panels.description: Bytes pending in send buffer. High = backpressure.

panels.title: Cache Hit Rate
panels.description: Subscription cache hit rate. Higher is better.

panels.title: CPU Usage
panels.description: CPU cores consumed. 0-1 = 0-100% of one core.

panels.title: Open File Descriptors
panels.description: Open FDs. Watch for approaching max.
